DoubleTree Classic Champions
C-USA Regular-Season Champions
C-USA Tournament Champions |BowlTourney= |BowlTourneyResult= }} The '''2009â10 Tulane Green Wave women's basketball team''' will represent [[Tulane University]] in the [[2009â10 NCAA Division I women's basketball season]]. The Green Wave will be coached by [[Lisa Stockton]]. The Green Wave are a member of Conference USA and will attempt to win its first NCAA championship. ==Offseason== *July 10: Tulane women's basketball announced the addition of Shondra Johnson to the coaching staff. The New Orleans native and all-SEC performer at Alabama was a member of the coaching staff at Samford University.http://www.tulanegreenwave.com/sports/w-baskbl/spec-rel/071009aaa.html *August 14: Head coach Lisa Stockton announced an addition to the team. Janique Kautsky will join the program. The 5-10 guard/forward comes to Tulane from Perth, Australia.http://www.tulanegreenwave.com/sports/w-baskbl/spec-rel/081409aaa.html ==Preseason== {{Empty section|date=July 2010}} ==Regular season== *The Green Wave will participate in the Navy Classic from November 20â21. In addition, the club will participate in the Big Easy Classic on December 4 and 5. From December 28â29, the club will host the [[Tulane DoubleTree Classic]]. ===Roster=== {|class="wikitable sortable" width="80%" |- align="center" style="background:#063003;color:#CCEEFF;" |
